homePage.aboutMeText: Since childhood I showed interest in technology, making my way through electronics, telecommunications and programming careers, I ran into web development, and immediately knew that was my place. It was like love at first glance. Working with passion and dedication for you and me, because this is more than a job, it's something that makes me feel great.

homePage.experienceText: I have intermediate knowledge of HTML 5, CSS 3, SASS and JS 5. I also have experience using Jquery, JSON, AJAX, Bootstrap among other libraries and programming methods.
